Just confirming that we’ve updated the page as requested:
https://shellshockedmedia.com/im-your-peri-godmother/

Also, regarding your note “We also need a tab on the landing page that says PERI GODMOTHER” — we’ve added “Peri Godmother” to the site menu as well, so it’s now accessible from the main navigation.

Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like tweaked!

Hi,

Can you please add another

LET'S DO THIS
PRE ORDER NOW

Above the video as it is on all of the other pages. I want them to be able to purchase straight away and have the back up at the bottom.

And in the text please split
I'm Your Peri Godmother (larger font)
by Shelly Horton (smaller font)

And even the two columns by moving this sentence to column two. "Now, she's breaking the silence and dishing up everything you really need to know with zero shame and a whole lotta sass."

We also need a tab on the landing page that says PERI GODMOTHER

Thank you

Shelly

Hi Shelly,

I hope all is well.

Confirming we have updated the page.
https://shellshockedmedia.com/im-your-peri-godmother/

Let us know if this works for you?

Hello Rica,

Please add a line like we have on other course pages under the main heading (example here) https://shellshockedmedia.com/media-presentation-training-with-shelly-horton/
Let's Do This and a Pre-Order Now button - that links to this https://geni.us/ImYourPeriGodmother

Add this copy beneath the video please.

I'm Your Peri Godmother by Shelly Horton

Think perimenopause is just hot flushes and the odd missed period? Bless. Think again. This is the first ever Aussie guide to perimenopause that says it like it is-raw, real, and ridiculously funny. Health advocate and journalist Shelly Horton went from media powerhouse to a hormonal hot mess in the ICU, all because she had no idea what perimenopause actually was. Spoiler alert: it's not just for "old ladies" and it's definitely not just a few sweaty nights. Now, she's breaking the silence and dishing up everything you really need to know with zero shame and a whole lotta sass.



I'm Your Peri Godmother is your ultimate survival guide through the hormone hurricane - with expert advice from menopause legends like Dr Louise Newson, Dr Mary Claire Haver, and Dr Kelly Casperson. Plus, it's stacked with evidence-based treatments, laugh-out-loud stories, and brutally honest truths that'll have you yelling "same!"

Learn:


  • The truth about HRT (and whether it's your new bestie)

  • How to handle insomnia, anxiety, mood swings, weight gain and bleeding like a crime scene

  • Which supplements actually help (and which are just overpriced snake oil)

  • Why your vagina needs TLC - and we're not kidding

  • How to survive work without rage-quitting on the daily



Shelly's your fierce, fabulous, no-bullshit peri godmother. She's here to wave her magic wand (and maybe a bottle of shiraz), hold your hand, and get you through perimenopause without losing your mind - or your sense of humour.



Buy it. Read it. Share it. Let's smash the silence together.

Available July 29. Pre-order now.

Thank you x

Shelly Horton
0404 868 463
www.shellshockedmedia.com
